values: （指过去）当时；那时；（指将来）到那时；届时；随后；接着；其后；后来；然后；于是；因此；那么；既然如此；此外；再者；另外

synonym.mean: 然后；那么；于是；当时；此外

word_group.brief_definition: 而且远远不止于此；而且还要多
(提出建议或提供帮助)喂, 听我说
只有那时；只有这样；只有

list.abstract: Americansaturdaynight是布拉德·佩斯利的第八张专辑，制作人也是从1999年就开始合作的老搭档FrankRogers。首支单曲《Then》发行后曾上升到乡村音乐排行榜的首位，这也是他的第14支乡村音乐冠军单曲。布拉德·佩斯利还提到他的这张专辑抒发了自己的感情，他说：“我想让听众感觉到我在这张专辑中所说的。”

yingyinNormal.en: Scoop, then plop. Say it. Scoop and plop. Say it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 挖，然后放，跟我说。挖然后放，跟我说。

yingyinNormal.en: And then to our own military.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后是我们的军队。

yingyinNormal.en: Then I have moment of clarity.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后我就想明白了。

yingyinNormal.en: Then the real nightmare began.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后，真正的噩梦开始了。

yingyinNormal.en: And then your face is bloated? No.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后你的脸就肿了？不是。

yingyinNormal.en: He then applies the strip to Dave's palm.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后贴到戴夫的掌心。

yingyinNormal.en: So if we find a home, then what?
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果我们找到一个新家园，然后呢？

yingyinNormal.en: Then we sit on this one curb, right outside.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后找个马路牙子坐下来。

yingyinNormal.en: And then I just continued blend all the way out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后我就继续充分抹匀。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay. So if we find a home, then what?
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，假设找到一个地方，然后呢？

yingyinNormal.en: And then there's the overview of the Triassic.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后接下来是三叠纪的概观。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, white moves first. And then we play.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，现在白方先走，然后开战。

yingyinNormal.en: You'd be very impressed. Then very dead.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你绝对会印象深刻，然后生不如死。

yingyinNormal.en: And then we begin to stir all the ingredients together.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后搅拌所有的原料。

yingyinNormal.en: I will speak first, and then you will speak, Paul.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我先说，然后你再说，保罗。

yingyinNormal.en: It will magnetically seal, and then you're good to go.
yingyinNormal.zh: 它会磁力密封然后就一些就绪。

yingyinNormal.en: Then I'm going to go away with ANASTASIA BROW WIZ.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后开始使用安娜塔西亚双头眉笔。

yingyinNormal.en: Then they remembered all the treasures he left behind.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后，他们想起了他留下的宝物。

yingyinNormal.en: They were massacred. Then they walked upstairs?
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们都被屠杀了。然后他们去了楼上吗？

yingyinNormal.en: And then it turns out there's another human being.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后突然发现这星球上还有一个人类。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Then</highlight> the kids were handed chocolate coins, and given a chance to share them with an anonymous child.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后，（研究者）分发给孩子们一些金币巧克力，并给他们一次机会可以与一位匿名的孩子分享。

examination_example.sentence: At night, scan the horizon for artificial light sources, such as fires and streetlights, <highlight>then</highlight> walk toward the glow of light pollution.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 晚上，扫视地平线，寻找像火和街灯的人工光源，然后朝发光的光污染方向走。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Then</highlight> his marriage failed, his career burned out and his drinking became serious.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后，他的婚姻失败了，事业崩溃了，酗酒变得严重起来。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Then</highlight> you are inadvertently modeling a lack of emotional control for your kids.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那么，你无意中在孩子面前树立着一个缺乏情绪控制的形象。

examination_example.sentence: Never mind the quality, <highlight>then</highlight>, count the number.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，别管质量如何，数一下数量吧。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Then</highlight> it presents that connection, even among two-year-olds, between girls as not only innocent but as evidence of innocence.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，粉色就呈现出女生之间、甚至是两岁女孩之间的共性：纯真，且粉色也被视为女孩纯真的证明。

sense_info_list.en: existing or acting at that time

examination_example.sentence: Facebook promised the European commission <highlight>then</highlight> that it would not link phone numbers to Facebook identities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 脸书（Facebook）当时向欧盟委员会承诺，不会将电话号码与脸书（Facebook）的身份认证关联。

examination_example.sentence: Enhanced security measures since <highlight>then</highlight>, combined with a rise in airline travel, have resulted in long waits at major airports.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从那以后，强化的安全措施，以及航空旅行增多，导致了在大型机场要长时间排队等候。

examination_example.sentence: From <highlight>then</highlight> on his sketches, which appeared under the pen name "Boz" in The Evening Chronicle, earned him a modest reputation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在那之后，他以“博兹”为笔名在《晚间纪事》上发表的短篇小说，为他赢得了一定的赞誉。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Then</highlight> there's the fact that large American companies are much more globalized than ever before.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 而且，事实上，美国大型公司比以往任何时候都更加全球化。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Then</highlight> there is the scale of the typical housing project.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另外就是其特有的住房项目建筑规模。

examination_example.sentence: Humans are unique in their capacity to not only make tools but <highlight>then</highlight> turn around and use them to create superfluous material goods.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人类是独一无二的，他们不仅能够制造工具，并且能转而使用这些工具创造出大量物质商品。

examination_example.sentence: The discussion will <highlight>then</highlight> become more like a chess game than a boxing match.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 总之，讨论将变得更像一场国际象棋比赛，而不是一场拳击比赛。

examination_example.sentence: How the whole image is <highlight>then</highlight> assembled and perceived is still a mystery although it is the subject of current research.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 总之，尽管整个图像是当前研究的主题，但它是如何被组合和感知的仍然是一个谜。

examination_example.sentence: So <highlight>then</highlight> the problem is not really about technology, but rather, "how do we innovate our institutions and our work practices?"
examination_example.sentence_trans: 也就是说，问题不在于技术，而在于“我们如何创新我们的机构和工作实践”?

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: If it is, <highlight>then</highlight> you can easily send it back to the manufacturer, and they'll send you a brand-new one for free surely.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果是的话，你可以很容易地把它退回给制造商，他们肯定会免费送你一个全新的。

examination_example.sentence: Would you say <highlight>then</highlight> that most successful people make it all by themselves?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那么，你会说大多数成功人士都是靠自己成功的吗？

examination_example.sentence: If your model of reality is wildly different from the actual world, <highlight>then</highlight> you struggle to take effective actions each day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你的现实模式与现实世界大不相同，那么你每天都很难采取有效的行动。

examination_example.sentence: Parents can comment along the way and <highlight>then</highlight> explain the message at the end.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 家长可以一路评论，然后在最后解释信息。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Then</highlight> they could compare outcomes for each group.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后他们可以比较每组的结果。

examination_example.sentence: They'd <highlight>then</highlight> go further to explain the specific, and objective, criteria the employee must meet to receive their desired rewards.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后，他们会进一步解释员工必须满足的具体、客观的标准才能获得他们想要的奖励。

sense_info_list.en: existing or acting at that time

word_usage.usage:
then表“那时”时，既可指过去，也可指将来。
示例：(1) Life was harder then. 
那时生活比较艰苦。 
(2) I've been invited too, so I'll see you then. 
我也接到邀请，我们到那时见。

then表“然后, 接着”时，常与and连用。
示例：We lived in France and then Italy. 
我们先住在法国，后来住在意大利。

then表“那么, 因此”时，可与if从句搭配使用。
示例：If you miss that train then you'll have to get a taxi. 
如果你错过那趟火车，那就得坐出租车。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 当时; 然后; 那么

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 不过；可是话又说回来了

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 当时; 然后; 那么

examination_example.sentence: Did Nielsen <highlight>then</highlight> feel content in his career?
examination_example.sentence_trans: Nielsen当时对自己的职业生涯感到满意吗？

examination_example.sentence: You can't help wondering how hard it was for the people <highlight>then</highlight> to put all those rocks into place.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你禁不住想知道，当时的人们要把这些石头放在合适的位置有多难。

examination_example.sentence: At this store, people check out and <highlight>then</highlight> go off to the side to bag their own groceries.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这家商店里，人们退房，然后走到一边去打包他们自己的食品。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Then</highlight>, on April 11, 2017, at 10:00 P.M., we were all going to bed when the phone rang.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后，2017年4月11日，晚上10点，我们都要睡觉的时候，电话响了。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Then</highlight> I started to be positive（积极的）towards my life, and I was happy about who I really was．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后我开始积极地面对我的生活，为真实的自己感到高兴。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Then</highlight> I realized that no one passed the exam at all.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后，我意识到根本没有人通过考试。

examination_example.sentence: Until <highlight>then</highlight>, she thought she had a difficult life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在那之前，她认为自己的生活很艰难。

examination_example.sentence: From <highlight>then</highlight> on, I practiced even harder.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从那以后，我更加努力地练习。

examination_example.sentence: Since <highlight>then</highlight>, Xue has been a model for the people around her.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从那以后，薛一直是她身边人的榜样。

sense_info_list.en: existing or acting at that time

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Then</highlight> that's a good name for it!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，这是一个好名字！

examination_example.sentence: It follows, <highlight>then</highlight>, that we have different experiences of time in different situations.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，我们在不同的情况下有不同的时间体验。

examination_example.sentence: If you learn something, <highlight>then</highlight> you've grown.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你学到了什么，那么你就成长了。

examination_example.sentence: The problem will not be solved until teenagers can manage their lives, and <highlight>then</highlight> still have time to sleep．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 直到青少年能够管理自己的生活，还要有时间睡觉，这个问题才会得到解决。

examination_example.sentence: Imagine working for 12 hours, always on your feet, and <highlight>then</highlight> dealing with the most rude customers?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 想象一下，工作12个小时，总是站着，还要和最粗鲁的顾客打交道？

word_usage.usage:
then表“那时”时，既可指过去，也可指将来。
示例：(1) Life was harder then. 
那时生活比较艰苦。 
(2) I've been invited too, so I'll see you then. 
我也接到邀请，我们到那时见。

then表“然后, 接着”时，常与and连用。
示例：We lived in France and then Italy. 
我们先住在法国，后来住在意大利。

then表“那么, 因此”时，可与if从句搭配使用。
示例：If you miss that train then you'll have to get a taxi. 
如果你错过那趟火车，那就得坐出租车。
